alert.note: Alert for Apache; Navajo (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 05 at 1:59PM MST until July 05 at 2:30PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM MDT FOR APACHE AND NAVAJO COUNTIES... At 258 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Greasewood Springs, or 21 miles southeast of Keams Canyon, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sunrise Springs and Greasewood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
